Description: August 15 or September 1 - You will know you're home when you walk into this impeccable Commonwealth Ave. building in the Back Bay. This 2nd floor, renovated one bedroom has hardwood floors throughout, a renovated kitchen with dishwasher with breakfast bar. The grand living room features a beautiful chandelier, ornamental fireplace with wood surround and built-ins. The living room and bedroom both feature stunning floor to ceiling, south facing windows with views of Comm. Ave and the trees. The renovated glass and tile bathroom features a large shower. Laundry is located in the building and common patio is available for resident use. Heat, hot water, and electricity are included in the rent. Easy access to Longwood Medical, Copley, Prudential, Newbury St. and everything the Back Bay has to offer. One month broker fee paid by tenant. null
